addr: 1 Wood Street City of London, Gt Lon EC2V 7WS GB
title: EFS Big Event: Diversity and Inclusion
desc: Big Event: Diversity and Inclusion   Kindly hosted by Eversheds, our next big event will look at the theme of Diversity and Inclusion. You?ll get the chance to hear about the work of the Engage for Success Special Interest Group that have been writing a white paper on this topic, as well as listen to a case study from a company with a great track record in this field. Eversheds will start the day with their insights into the legal landscape around diversity and inclusion, and we?ll have an update from Cathy Brown, Executive Director at Engage for Success on progress across the Movement. There?ll be an opportunity to stay and network?after the event.
